attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the SCIM Resource as defined by the Service Provider.

attributes.name: externalId
attributes.description: A String that is an identifier for the resource as defined by the provisioning client.The service provider MUST always interpret the externalId as scoped to the provisioning domain.

attributes.name: displayName
attributes.description: A human-readable name for the Group. REQUIRED.

attributes.name: members
attributes.description: A list of members of the Group.

subAttributes.name: value
subAttributes.description: Identifier of the member of this Group.

subAttributes.name: $ref
subAttributes.description: The uri corresponding to a SCIM resource that is a member of this Group.

subAttributes.name: display
subAttributes.description: A human-readable name for the Member

subAttributes.name: type
subAttributes.description: A label indicating the type of resource, e.g. 'User' or 'Group'
